thread.title: Mark Cuban Advises Democrats Not To Block Trump's Supreme Court Pick
thread.title_full: Mark Cuban Advises Democrats Not To Block Trump's Supreme Court Pick

title: Mark Cuban Advises Democrats Not To Block Trump's Supreme Court Pick

organizations.name: block trump's supreme court pick   billionaire

text:
Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban is urging Democrats to negotiate rather than obstruct President Donald Trump’s Supreme Court nominee pick.
Trump on Tuesday night announced his nomination of Judge Neil Gorsuch to replace the late Justice Antonin Scalia.
While many Democrats were gearing up to block Gorsuch’s confirmation, Cuban posted a series of tweets Tuesday explaining why that would result in more failure for the party.
 
Related Stories Federal Judge Deals A Big Blow To President Trump Press Freaks After Trump Departs From White House Unexpectedly: ‘This Is Not Normal’ Senate Confirms Former Exxon CEO Tillerson As Secretary Of State If Dems are smart they will ask @POTUS what they can get from him in exchange for a quick @scotus approval. Negotiate with the negotiator
— Mark Cuban (@mcuban) February 1, 2017 

1) obstructionism was everything wrong with @tedcruz , Mconnell and the republicans. Every reasonable person HATED IT. It ruined governance
— Mark Cuban (@mcuban) February 1, 2017 

2)Bannon is praying the dems take the same approach.They will use it to expand their base and demonize Dems "See, they hate you & progress"
— Mark Cuban (@mcuban) February 1, 2017 

 
The Shark Tank star explained that because Trump is a deal maker, he would be open to negotiating something beneficial for both parties.
“Trump would love to say he beat the system by making a deal. Gives him bragging rights. ‘Never been done before.’ He isn’t a politician,” Cuban tweeted .
The alternative path — obstructing everything Trump does — would lead to the same outcome as the presidential election, Cuban said.
A wealthy businessman himself, Cuban spent much of 2016 criticizing Trump and championing Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton.
  Trump Honors Scalia’s Widow As He Nominates Scalia’s Successor Trump Cancels Signing Of Cybersecurity Executive Order After Suspension For Attacking Conway, Philly Anchor Makes Another Inappropriate Comment He recently attacked the president’s executive order temporarily halting immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries.
“It’s horrible! Look, let’s just be real clear. The ban was half-a–ed and half-baked,” Cuban told CNN’s Erin Burnett. “If the goal was security, why do you leave off any other countries that hosted terrorism? That’s like locking your front door and leaving all your windows open.”
The Shark Tank star offered Trump the same advice he gave to the Democrats: Listen to the other side and learn to make compromises.
“In my mind, a good leader would say, ‘OK, I need to sit down and talk to the guys who oppose me. Let me let them voice their opinions, let me get their thought process,'” Cuban said. “The Donald Trump I know, when he gets confidence, he’s confident. And when he is confident he works based off his instincts, and so I think that’s what’s happening.”
What do you think?
